quotes.quote: Imagine our imaginations were limited only to the limitless. Still, it wouldn't matter without a motivation to move.
What we imagine in our minds becomes our world.
Live out of your imagination, not your history.
You need imagination in order to imagine a future that doesn't exist.
Imagination is more important than knowledge.
Your imagination is your preview of life's coming attractions.
So imagine that the lovely moon is playing just for you everything makes music if you really want it to
Imagine, and it shall be. There are no limits.
Imagination allows us to escape the predictable. It enables us to reply to the common wisdom that we cannot soar by saying, just watch!
Our imagination goes ahead of us, bringing our yesterday's imagings into present realities.
No one ever made a great discovery without the exercise of the imagination.
You can't depend on your eyes when your imagination is out of focus.
If you can imagine it, you can achieve it. If you can dream it, you can become it.
Imagination was given to man to compensate for what he is not; a sense of humour to console him for what he is.
Anything you can imagine is probably true. And the worst you can imagine is probably worth money.
Imagine no limitations; decide what's right and desirable before you decide what's possible.
Imagine with all your mind, believe with all your heart, achieve with all your might.
Imagination, the supreme delight of the immortal and the immature, should be limited. In order to enjoy life, we should not enjoy it too much.
Everything you can imagine is real.
Imagination is the highest kite that one can fly.
If you don't imagine, nothing ever happens at all.
All men who have achieved great things have been great dreamers.
Make your life a masterpiece; imagine no limitations on what you can be, have or do.
Imagine what the world would be like if everyone was positive for one day.
Imagination is the beginning of creation. You imagine what you desire, you will what you imagine and at last you create what you will.
The imagination is a palette of bright colors. You can use it to touch up memories or you can use it to paint dreams.
